title: Francisco Martínez (boxer)
text: Francisco Martínez (born 20 August 1976) is a Mexican <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201996%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Lightweight">men's lightweight</a> event at the <a href="1996%20Summer%20Olympics">1996 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1996 Summer Olympics, he lost to <a href="Michael%20Strange%20%28boxer%29">Michael Strange</a> of Canada.
